channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Live
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN will broadcast GRAND SUMO May Tournament Day 8 action live from Tokyo, as top wrestlers have their eighth bouts of the 15-day contest.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Anime Manga Explosion
channel.desc: Join us as we explore Japanese anime adaptations of American comics and the creativity that emerges when two pop culture giants collide! Plus, a behind-the-scenes look at the latest Batman Ninja.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Mitateru Phose: Let's Change Perspectives!
channel.desc: This program employs "mitateru," a Japanese technique, to inspire children's imagination by encouraging them to view objects differently and develop their unique perspectives and creativity.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: J Melo
channel.desc: Join May J. for great Japanese music! This week, three energetic idol groups: 12-member group Not Equal Me, Hello! Project group Angerme, and Cho Tokimeki Sendenbu, who just released a new single.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus Mini
channel.desc: People in Japan use roughly 150 new cardboard boxes a year. In a 5-minute digest, we examine a broad range of Japan's innovative cardboard products, including waterproof packaging and emergency goods.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: Miyama is famous for its roof thatching tradition. The town of Hanase continues to serve the local specialty, foraged, wild-food cuisine.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Zero Waste Life
channel.desc: Meet people around Japan who strive for a life without waste under the traditional philosophy of "MOTTAINAI," which values cherishing the things we have.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Meals For One: Recipes To Soothe The Soul
channel.desc: After the death of her beloved husband, cooking expert Kurihara Harumi began looking for ways to deal with her grief. Now she works on "meals for one" recipes to help people cope with living alone.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: J Flicks
channel.desc: Japanese cinema in-depth! The latest info on the best of Japanese cinema, from blockbuster to indie, stars, film festivals, interviews, and insights.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Anime Manga Explosion
channel.desc: Join us as we explore Japanese anime adaptations of American comics and the creativity that emerges when two pop culture giants collide! Plus, a behind-the-scenes look at the latest Batman Ninja.

channel.title: Mitateru Phose: Let's Change Perspectives!
channel.desc: This program employs "mitateru," a Japanese technique, to inspire children's imagination by encouraging them to view objects differently and develop their unique perspectives and creativity.

channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Okinawa: The Holiest Place
channel.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: The Holiest Place.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ekiben Japan
channel.desc: A bento from Akashi, Hyogo features a local octopus specialty.The container of this unique bento is also interesting as they're shaped the same as the pots used in traditional octopus fishing.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese For Work
channel.desc: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design Ah Neo
channel.desc: Design is fun! Design feels good! Cutting-edge images and music guide children to enjoy exploring the ideas and tweaks in the designs all around us. An episode on Shells.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Little Charo
channel.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-7.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Cat's Eye View Of Japan
channel.desc: On a hot summer's day, a kitty leads us to traditional food near a local shrine. Get cool in a maiko's home with another kitty before enjoying sparklers at night.

channel.title: Ekiben Japan
channel.desc: A bento from Akashi, Hyogo features a local octopus specialty.The container of this unique bento is also interesting as they're shaped the same as the pots used in traditional octopus fishing.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: For over 20 years, Kuwayama Norihiko has been providing psychological care to children traumatized by war in places such as Palestine and the former Yugoslavia. He talks about being there for others.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: The number of visitors to Japan is rising. However, many do not know what to do during an earthquake, tsunami or typhoon. Find out the technologies being developed to protect visitors from disasters.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese
channel.desc: #39 I lost my wallet. / To explain that you did something you didn't intend to, use the "te" form of a verb, and add "shite shimaimashita." So, "otosu" (to drop) becomes "otoshite shimaimashita.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: We introduce the renewed NEWSROOM TOKYO featuring its team of new anchors and highlighting its appeal through a special Expo-focused episode.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Biz Stream
channel.desc: This upbeat program combines business and economic news with in-depth feature stories that give you a closer look at the latest trends within Japan and around the world.

channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from May 18th, Day 8 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: Inami Shishimai is a type of lion dance performed in Toyama Prefecture. Adults play the role of the shishi while a child is the shishi-tori, whose job is to pacify the shishi with sacred objects.

channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life(4)
channel.desc: With its splendid branches and white plum blossoms, this famous painting is known for captivating Van Gogh. Discover why people were able to tell this was a specific tree at Kameido Umeyashiki.

channel.title: Culture Crossroads
channel.desc: As a series in Culture Crossroads, BOSAI Be Prepared provides practical knowledge to save life from natural disaster. Today, we learn what and how much to pack, and where to keep it for quick access.

channel.desc: A week into the new year, giant torches are lit in a shrine precinct. The shadows they create enable a demon-oni-to go to a river and cleanse people of troubles. This is Oniyo: the night of the oni.

channel.desc: Japanese strawberries stand out with a perfect sweet-sour balance and stunning looks. Join us in Fukuoka for some dazzling parfait and to meet the growers behind a famous variety.

channel.title: Treasure Box Japan
channel.desc: Dotonbori, the heart of Osaka's food scene, strives to remain beloved through efforts by its shopping district that include a vegan-friendly cafe, tackling waste issues, and supporting at-risk youth.

channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Through research on the calls of the Japanese tit, Suzuki Toshitaka has proven that animals other than humans have language capabilities. He talks about pioneering the field of animal linguistics.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto
channel.desc: The ancient capital, Kyoto, continues to be innovative after 1,200 years. We dive deep into its core. Today: Modern Architecture - breathing life into the ancient capital in a new age.

channel.title: Today's Close Up
channel.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus
channel.desc: Family restaurants are uniquely Japanese establishments that are also popular with solo diners. We see how innovative services have helped them survive the ups and downs of the restaurant industry.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from May 21th, Day 11 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: Participants of the Hyoge Festival clown around in fun, silly costumes. It originated as a sly way of thanking a local hero, who built reservoirs but was exiled in the 17th century.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Sato Motoyuki developed a mine detector that uses radar technology to visualize landmines. It's currently being used in Ukraine and other parts of the world. He talks about his work to clear mines.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Treasure Box Japan
channel.desc: Famed for the speed and power of its float pulling, the Kishiwada Danjiri Festival is a dynamic spectacle. This episode highlights the two-day festival and the passion of those involved.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Masterpieces Of Tsutaju
channel.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode features ukiyo-e artist Sharaku's "The Actor Ichikawa Ebizo as Takemura Sadanoshin.

channel.title: Chatroom Japan
